item.title: A new hope | First victory of 2017
item.author: Joshua L O'Donnell,
item.description: A man with a Scouse accent, unfortunate bowels and admittedly good tackling technique once said: ‘Imperial have never won a game without me’. The record remained standing as IC 1s dominated the set-piece to win a comfortable away victory against Surrey. Man of the Match Tom ‘Shuz’ Szyszko put in an …

item.title: Imperial Guys Could
item.author: Joshua L O'Donnell,
item.description: Last term in the midst of ‘Imperial Girls Can’ week the ICURFC gentlemen headed down to Kent for their last formal game of 2015 in the hope that they could make the ladies of Imperial proud. With our eyes set on the league title the necessity for repeated bonus point wins cannot be stressed enough; …
